attributes.action: compensate EVERYONE who has been disadvantaged  by the abolition of the 10p tax band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are still numbers of people whose incomes have still been disadvantaged by the removal of the 10p tax band  .  We petition the government to compensate us as well .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
